column35: This study focused on the movement of migratory birds in Europe and Africa. Although they discussed the impacts of marine fisheries on the marine mega-fauna, they did not quantify such impacts. They showed that juvenile and adult Northern gannets and Scopoli's Shearwaters made extensive use of marine waters off West Africa during their autumn migration and wintering phase. The West Africa has experienced massive foreign fisheries that might affect both juvenile and adult European seabirds during their autumn migration and at their wintering grounds.
